solution_line_template: Two dozens of doughnuts are equal to {num_dozen} x {dozen} = <<{num_dozen}*{dozen}={total_doughnuts}>>{total_doughnuts} doughnuts.
Since {doughnuts_eaten} doughnuts were eaten, therefore {total_doughnuts} - {doughnuts_eaten} = <<{total_doughnuts}-{doughnuts_eaten}={doughnuts_left}>>{doughnuts_left} doughnuts are left.
